unshippedItems.pageDescription: Manage partial order fulfillments and items that were ordered but could not be shipped due to stock limitations.
unshippedItems.title: Unshipped Items
unshippedItems.aboutDescription: Understand how unshipped items are managed in the system
unshippedItems.whatAreUnshippedItemsDescription: Unshipped items occur when a customer orders products that are currently out of stock or have insufficient quantity. Instead of cancelling the entire order, the system allows for partial fulfillment.
unshippedItems.authorizationProcessDescription: Unshipped items require manager authorization before they can be fulfilled in subsequent orders. This ensures proper oversight of partial fulfillment processes.
unshippedItems.managersResponsibilityDescription: As a manager, you can review and authorize unshipped items. Once authorized, these items will be prioritized for inclusion in new orders for the same customer.
